messages.content: Tell me about ISS but don't use the letter "s"/"S"

ISS or International Space Station  is a large spacecraft in orbit around the Earth. It serve as a home where crew member live and work while conducting research in microgravity. The ISS program involve a partnership of 15 nation working together. The ISS include module and component built in various countries and assembled in space during orbital construction mission. The ISS has been continuously occupied since November 2000. The ISS provide a platform for long-term scientific research, allow testing of spacecraft system and equipment required for long-duration spaceflight and exploration, and enable educational activities. The ISS facilitate cooperation between nation through joint scientific research and international partnership.
